name: Discord Messenger
description:
Discord Messenger is a game where you can play to send messages to a Discord Server. The Discord server can be found on the right-hand side of the Main Menu when launching the game or by clicking on this link: https://discord.gg/xhCat9U4FX

This is a fun little project I worked on and is not meant to be something that was made for a professional purpose but just as a fun project.
